summary: SummaryThe Erborian ultra-fine Centella Cleansing Oil removes makeup (including waterproof), excess sebum and impurities, while maintaining the skin's natural hydration.
details: DetailsBenefitsDissolves all makeup, including waterproof, and effectively removes excess sebum and sunscreen.Cleanses skin without leaving any tightness.Formulated with good-for-you ingredients to make sure you're going a step beyond cleansing.FeaturesGood for all skin types.Its transformative texture from an oil to a milky emulsion ensures skin won't feel stripped of its natural oils.Upon cleansing, the user is left with clean skin and no greasy residue.Key IngredientsCentella Asiatica, traditionally used for its ultra-soothing and comforting properties, is the star ingredient in this cleanser.Sweet Almond Oil intensely nourishes skin.Sunflower Oil works to prevent skin from feeling stripped.Item 2599504How To UseApply directly to dry skin and massage gently over the face and eye area with circular movements. Add a little water to create a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Tested under dermatological and ophthalmological supervision. Non-comedogenic.IngredientsHelianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Olus Oil/Vegetable Oil, Bisabolol, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply directly to dry skin and massage gently over the face and eye area with circular movements. Add a little water to create a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Tested under dermatological and ophthalmological supervision. Non-comedogenic.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Not only is this oil great at cleansing, but believe it or not, this gives me the closest and smoothest shave as well! I used this when my shaving oil ran out and this product worked a million times better!

reviews.headline: Slightly Heavy
reviews.comments: It's good at cleansing, but it left an oily residue on my skin when I washed it off. I think this would probably be best for a dry skin type. I have combination skin for reference.

reviews.headline: Great oil cleanser.
reviews.comments: I use this once a day at night with my water based cleanser to remove the sunscreen and oils from my face. It does a really good job at removing excess oils, sunscreen, and other dirt and grime from outside. I highly recommend to give it a try and it also lasts a long time, you only need one pump. I bought it back in February and its not even half way finished (and thats with mostly consistent use).

reviews.headline: Best oil cleanser!!
reviews.comments:
I bought this on a whim and boy am I glad. This stuff is amazing. Cleanses the skin so well.
No oiliness at all. Kinda crazy with it being an oil. 
I absolutely love this! Can't wait to try more from this brand.

faceoff_positive.comments: After using the E45 cleansing foam for a while now due to very sensitive skin, I decided to switch to this cleansing oil as I am such a huge fan of other Erborian products. This oil removes make up very effectively and leaves skin feeling so moisturised - I only have to follow up with a little of the Centella Moisturiser afterwards. Can't believe how soft my face feels. I've definitely been converted! If you have sensitive skin, do what I did and order the small size first and see how you get on. I'm back on here today to buy the big bottle!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for sensitive skin

faceoff_negative.comments: It's good at cleansing, but it left an oily residue on my skin when I washed it off. I think this would probably be best for a dry skin type. I have combination skin for reference.
faceoff_negative.headline: Slightly Heavy
